Uses of Class
ch.cern.dbod.db.entity.Instance

  • Packages that use Instance 
    Package Description
    ch.cern.dbod.db.dao
    The dao package contains the DAO classes to carry out all the operations that need access to the database.
    ch.cern.dbod.db.entity
    It contains the classes that represent the relational data stored in the database.
    ch.cern.dbod.ui.controller
    The controller package is the most important package UI-wise.
    ch.cern.dbod.ui.model
    The model package contains models used for data representation by different ZK components.
    ch.cern.dbod.util
    This package contains the consumer for the SOAP Web Services implemented in the DB On Demand Syscontrol project.
